title.narrative: 2016 LB048 Community Based Psychosocial Support in Syria

description.narrative: The grant will support War Child's implementing partners in Syria to implement a "back to school" campaign with the start of the 2015-2016 academic year, with funds contributing to the purchase of education materials and school bags.
